oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1956-11-03 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from November 3, 1956. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Ernest Tubb (host/performer), guest performer Rex Allen, and regular performers the Jordanaires, Tommy Jackson, Del Wood, June Carter, and Chet Atkins. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Ernest Tubb; Jordanaires; Rex Allen; Tommy Jackson; Del Wood
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces Ernest Tubb -- Mississippi Gal (Ernest Tubb) -- Opening statement (Grant Turner, Ernest Tubb) -- Ernest Tubb introduces the Jordanaires -- The Lord Is A Busy Man (Jordanaires) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Ernest Tubb) -- Ernest Tubb introduces Rex Allen -- L-O-N-E-S-O-M-E Letter Blues (Rex Allen) -- Ernest Tubb introduces Tommy Jackson -- Sally Gooden (Tommy Jackson fiddle) -- Ernest Tubb talks -- When Jesus Calls (Ernest Tubb) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Ernest Tubb) -- Prince Albert jingle -- Ernest Tubb introduces Del Wood -- Listen To The Mockingbird (Del Wood)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Jordanaires (Musical group); Jackson, Tommy; Tubb, Ernest, 1914-1984; Byrd, Billy; Allen, Rex, 1920-1999
